title: #1533 Remember The Bag?
itunes:title: #1533 Remember The Bag?
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing the long since defunct doctor's bag. They then turn to masks as the explore the current rules and thinking surrounding the mandates, especially where it applies to kids and schools. They then turn to the phones and speak to a caller who wants to expand on Adam's 'safe spaces vs. octagons' theory that he often discusses and look at how it might manifest in the future. 

Please Support Our Sponsors:
